pages.text: alm nkhlqkm- ya maeshar alkfar- min maa' daeif hqyr wahu alntft, fajaealna hdha alma' fi makan hsyn, wahu rahim almrat, 'iilaa waqt mahdud wmelwm eind allah teala? faqadarna ealaa khalaqah wtswyrh w'ikhrajh, faniem alqadirun nhn

hlak waeadhab shadid yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin bqdrtna

alm najeal hadhih al'ard alty teyshwn elyha, tadumu ealaa zahriha 'ahya' la yhswn, wafi btnha amwatana la yhsrwn, wajaealna fiha jbala thwabt ealyat; lialaa tdtrb bkm, wa'asqaynakum ma'an edhbana sayghana?

alm najeal hadhih al'ard alty teyshwn elyha, tadumu ealaa zahriha 'ahya' la yhswn, wafi btnha amwatana la yhsrwn, wajaealna fiha jbala thwabt ealyat; lialaa tdtrb bkm, wa'asqaynakum ma'an edhbana sayghana?
hlak wdmar yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin bhdhh alnem

yqal lilkafirin yawm alqyamt: siruu 'iilaa eadhab jahanam aladhi kuntum bih tukadhibun fi aldnya, syru, fastzlu bidukhan jahanam ytfre minh thlath qte, la yuzil dhlk alzili min hurun dhlk alyawm, wala yadfae min hurun allahab shyyana. 'iina jahanam tqdhf min alnaar bisharar ezym, kl shararat minh kalbna' almshyd fi aleizm walartfae. ka'an shrr jahanam almttayr minha 'ibl sud ymyl lawnuha 'iilaa alssufrt

hdha yawm alqiamat aldhy la yantiq fih almukadhibun bklam ynfehm, wala yakun lahum 'iidhan fi alkalam fyetdhrwn; li'anah la edhr lhm

hlak waeadhab shadid yawmayidh lilmukadhibin bhdha alyawm wama fyh

hadha yawm yafsil allah fih bayn alkhlayq, wytmyz fih alhaqu min albatl, jamaenakum fih -ya maeshar kafaar hadhih alamt- mae alkufaar al'awalin min al'umam almadyt, fa'iin kan lakum hilatan fi alkhalas min aleadhab fahtalu, wanqdhu 'anfusakum min batsh allah wantqamh

hdha yawm yafsil allah fih bayn alkhlayq, wytmyz fih alhaqu min albatl, jamaenakum fih -ya maeshar kafaar hadhih alamt- mae alkufaar al'awalin min al'umam almadyt, fa'iin kan lakum hilatan fi alkhalas min aleadhab fahtalu, wanqdhu 'anfusakum min batsh allah wantqamh
hlak wdmar yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin biawm alqyamt

'in aladhin khafuu rabihim fi aldnya, wataquu eadhabah bamtthal awamrh wajtnab nwahyh, hum yawm alqiamat fi zilal al'ashjar alwarft waeuyun alma' aljaryt, wafawakih kathirat mimaa tashtahih 'anfusahum ytnemwn. yuqal lhm: kuluu 'aklana ldhydhana, washrabuu shrbana hnyyana; bsbb ma qadamtum fi aldunya min salih alaemal. 'iinaa bimithl dhlk aljaza' aleazim najzi 'ahl al'iihsan fi 'aemalahum wtaethm lna. hlak waeadhab shadid yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin biawm aljaza' walhisab wama fih min alnaeim waledhab

hlak waeadhab shadid yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin biawm alhisab waljza'
wa'iidha qil lhwla' almshrkyn: sllu llh, wakhsheu lh, la ykhshewn wala ysllun, bal ysrrun ealaa astkbarhm

hlak waeadhab shadid yawm alqiamat lilmukadhibin biayat allh, 'iin lam yuminuu bhdha alqran, fabi'ayi kitab wklam baedah ywmnwn? wahu almbyin likuli shy', alwadih fi hukmih wahkamh wakhbarh, almejz fi alfazh wmeanyh
